attributes.action: Action to be taken against PayPal
attributes.additional_details:
I/we ask the government to look to the PayPal issue where PayPal limit peoples accounts and withold monies in those accounts limited for no reason

I/we ask that the government punish PayPal for this illegal abuse of their tools as it is illegal what they are doing PayPal have been sued in a number of cases in america in classic lawsuits for doing exactly the same to those in and around america

Please everyone sign this wherever if its small or big amounts PayPal have held or are holding
